text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Creston, Louisiana | official_name = Hamlet of Creston | settlement_type = Unincorporated community | image_skyline =Bridge over Black Lake in Creston, LA IMG_7299.JPG | imagesize =250px | image_alt = | image_caption =Concrete bridge carries traffic on Louisiana State Highway 9 over Black Lake near Creston. | image = | pushpin_map = Louisiana | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = |coordinates = | pushpin_label = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = United States | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Louisiana | subdivision_type2 = Parish | subdivision_name2 = Natchitoches | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | named_for = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | elevation_ft = 161 | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Creston is an unincorporated community in Natchitoches Parish, Louisiana, United States.
